headline: Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. (TMO): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. on Rijnberk InvestInsights’s Substack by Daan | InvestInsights. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on TMO. Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc.’s share was trading at $484.96 as of July 28th. TMO’s trailing and forward P/E were 28.03 and 21.64, respectively according to Yahoo Finance. […]

headline: Waters raises lower end of 2025 profit forecast on demand for lab equipment
summary: Lab equipment maker Waters raised the lower end of its annual profit forecast on Monday after reporting better-than-expected second-quarter results on improved demand from biotech clients for its tools used in drug development and research. Shares of the Milford, Massachusetts-based company were up 3.7% premarket in low trading volumes. The company supplies lab equipment and technology across the world, with the majority of its revenue coming from biopharma clients who use its tools for research and drug development.
